Banner.Description: With 1.5 years of experience, I have developed systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to enhance the web. My focus is on writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Java,Spring Boot, Angular and MicroService I am dedicated to applying best practices and development standards to deliver high-quality solutions.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I am Piyush Kushwah, with 1.5 years of hands-on experience in Java, Spring Boot, Angular, TypeScript, and MySQL. In this time, I have taken on roles as a Backend Developer, Frontend Developer, and have contributed to various projects.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack developer
Description: Developed and maintained web applications using Java,Spring Boot ensuring robust backend functionality.
Collaborated with front-end to integrate RESTful APIs with Angular, enhancing the user experience.
Utilized MySQL for efficient data storage and retrieval, optimizing database queries for better performance.
Implemented best practices for code quality and maintainability, including unit testing and code reviews.
Worked closely with cross-functional teams, participating in agile methodologies to deliver high-quality software solutions.
Identified and resolved issues in both development and production environments, ensuring smooth and reliable application performance.

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Smart Tracko (CICO)
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Built for a coaching institute, Smart Tracko aims to enhance various aspects of institute management, including Tracking student attendance, Managing courses details and purchases, Facilitating quizzes, assignments, and notes.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Dollopian Foodies (Food Delivery Web Application)
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The Food Ordering System is a comprehensive platform designed to streamline every facet of Food operations.Developed the project using Angular, Spring Boot, and MySQL, ensuring a reliable and efficient system.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Exam Portal
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Designed to facilitate exams, track progress, and maintain detailed progress records, enhancing the efficiency of test-taking and performance monitoring. Developed Exam Portal with Angular, Spring Boot, and MySQL. Engineered responsive UI features and separate student/admin dashboards

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: FluxChat (Chat Box)
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Developed the project using Angular, Spring Boot, and MySQL, ensuring a reliable and efficient system. Implemented real-time communication features by leveraging Stomp.js and the WebSocket Protocol, enhancing the project's responsiveness and enabling seamless bidirectional data exchange between clients and servers. Successfully implemented real-time features, significantly improving user engagement and overall user experience.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: ContactMaster
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Developed a Phonebook Management System with multi-role interface for admins and users using Java Servlets and JSP. Employed MVC architecture, MySQL database, and JSTL for efficient data handling and dynamic page rendering. Implemented robust session management, secure access control, and comprehensive CRUD operations for users, contacts, and groups.

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Pokemon
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Pokemon search engine that uses the pokeapi. Object-oriented programming was used to organize the information of the pokemons along with their respective image.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Coming soon page
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a two-column split page to be used as a 'Coming soon page'. Scheduled to be a fully responsive design. It has a form field to subscribe by email.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Four card feature section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page that has a minimal design, listing four features on four cards. Input animations are done with angular animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Social proof section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a page designed from a Figma layout. Angular was used for development together with SASS and CSS GRID.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: FAQ accordion card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: FAQ accordion with logic and animations made in Angular.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Profile card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I'm always excited to connect with fellow professionals, potential collaborators, and anyone who is passionate about technology and innovation. Whether you have a question, a project idea, or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out.
